revision.text: Possibly: A short introduction to moral philosophy, in three books : containing the elements of ethicks and the law of nature / by Francis Hutcheson, LLD. late professor of philosophy in the University of Glasgow ; translated from the Latin. (Glasgow : Printed and sold by Robert Foulis printer to the University, MDCCXLVII [1747]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1301514~S1
